ygData.subject: Re: Slow progress
ygData.msgSnippet: Chad, maybe you can post some examples from your training set?  What are the inputs and outputs for example?  It might give me some idea what s going on.

Chad, maybe you can post some examples from your training set?  What 
are the inputs and outputs for example?  It might give me some idea 
what's going on.  Also, how many generations has it run so far?

ken

--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Chad Bohannan <chad@b...> wrote:
> ken,
> right it's asymtotic, not log.
> Anyway, I set up a larger training set, but the fitness curve 
appeared 
> to level off far short of close. It is still making improvements, 
and 
> maybe i'll see magic when i get home again, but i'm still 
dissapointed. 
> The chance of adding a node is set to 2%, so i'm crossing my 
fingers 
> that it's just being slow and carefull.
> Is there any science to prdicting the size/complexity of a domain 
before 
> starting? My experiment is to find a network that solves a cross 
> product. that seems really simple, but it is proving difficult.
> chad
